query: SELECT c.id "id!", c.location_id "location_id!", c.connected_from "connected_from!", c.start "start!", c.end "end!", COALESCE(( SELECT ls.upload FROM location_stats ls WHERE ls.location_id = c.location_id AND ls.collected_at >= c.start AND ls.collected_at <= c.end ORDER BY ls.collected_at DESC LIMIT 1 ), 0) "upload: _", COALESCE(( SELECT ls.download FROM location_stats ls WHERE ls.location_id = c.location_id AND ls.collected_at >= c.start AND ls.collected_at <= c.end ORDER BY ls.collected_at DESC LIMIT 1 ), 0) "download: _" FROM connection c WHERE location_id = $1 ORDER BY start DESC
